name: Orcs and Goblins
author: Xekon#8266
description: A savage race made up of various warring tribes.

orc_warboss.name: Orc Warboss
orc_warboss.description: Stronger and more savage than the normal orc.

armor_orc_warboss.name: Armorclad Warboss
armor_orc_warboss.description: A walking tank, clad in the best orcish armor and wielding deadly weapons.

primal_orc_warboss.name: Primal Warboss
primal_orc_warboss.description: A hulking beast covered in ritualistic tatoos and armed with savage weapons.

goblin_warboss.name: Goblin Warboss
goblin_warboss.description: Small in size but a master of deception.

goblin_shaman.name: Goblin Shaman
goblin_shaman.description: Miniscule in size but still a fearsome wizard.

orc_shaman.name: Orc Shaman
orc_shaman.description: Tough in stature and a fearsome wizard.

goblins.name: Goblins
goblins.description: Small and weak, making up this weakness trough their sheer numbers.

hobgoblins.name: Hobgoblins
hobgoblins.description: Larger and more cunning than normal goblins, but still rather pathetic.

orc_warriors.name: Orc Warriors
orc_warriors.description: Stronger and better equipped than the goblins.

orc_bolts.name: Orc Arbalestiers
orc_bolts.description: Stronger, better equipped, and a surprisingly good shot.

primal_warriors.name: Primal Orc Warriors
primal_warriors.description: Orcs covered in ritualistic tatoos and armed with crude weapons.

armor_warriors.name: Armorclad Warriors
armor_warriors.description: Orcs clad in the best orcish armor and wielding deadly weapons.

goblin_spider_riders.name: Goblin Spider Riders
goblin_spider_riders.description: Goblins that have tamed various kinds of deadly spiders and ride them into battle.

orc_brutes.name: Orc Brutes
orc_brutes.description: Bigger than their common brethren, wielding massive weapons.

trolls.name: Trolls
trolls.description: Massive dimwitted brutes with the ability to shrug off wounds that would kill a man.

armor_brutes.name: Armorclad Brutes
armor_brutes.description: Walking tanks with the finest orcish equipment, a menacing stature, and a good set of lungs to boot.

goblin_warboss_spider.name: Goblin Warboss on Giant Spider
goblin_warboss_spider.description: Small in size but a master of deception.

goblin_shaman_spider.name: Goblin Shaman on Giant Spider
goblin_shaman_spider.description: Miniscule in size but still a fearsome wizard.

goblin_warboss_beast.name: Goblin Warboss on Cave Beast
goblin_warboss_beast.description: Small in size but a master of deception.

goblin_shaman_beast.name: Goblin Shaman on Cave Beast
goblin_shaman_beast.description: Miniscule in size but still a fearsome wizard.

goblin_boss_wolf.name: Goblin Warboss on Dire Wolf
goblin_boss_wolf.description: Small in size but a master of deception.

goblin_shaman_wolf.name: Goblin Shaman on Dire Wolf
goblin_shaman_wolf.description: Miniscule in size but still a fearsome wizard.

orc_boar_riders.name: Orc Boar Riders
orc_boar_riders.description: Wild swine are just as bad-tempered as the savage greenskins who ride them, making for a devastating force.

goblin_wolf_riders.name: Goblin Wolf Riders
goblin_wolf_riders.description: Goblins that have tamed various kinds of feral wolves and ride them into battle.

orc_warboss_boar.name: Orc Warboss on Giant Boar
orc_warboss_boar.description: Stronger and more savage than the normal orc.

orc_warboss_warg.name: Orc Warboss on Great Warg
orc_warboss_warg.description: Stronger and more savage than the normal orc.

frenzy_banner.description: When this unit is activated, choose a friendly Infantry unit within 6". That unit's hit rolls of 1 or 2 cause an additional hit until the end of the round.
frenzy_banner.name: Frenzy Banner

goblin_tactics.name: Goblin Tactics
goblin_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Goblin_ _Infantry_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ 
 * Re-roll failed Initiative tests of 9+

orc_tactics.name: Orc Tactics
orc_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Orc_ _Infantry_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ 
 * Re-roll failed Initiative tests of 9+

lightning_bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightning_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 1 hit with AP(7).

haste.name: Haste
haste.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may immediately make a free move action.

warpath.name: Warpath
warpath.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may immediately make a free charge action.

strategies.name: Here We Go!
strategies.description: Use when a unit declares a Charge action. That unit gets +3" of Movement for that action.

strategies.name: Smash Them
strategies.flavor: It's about time we got to fighting.
strategies.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit performs a Fight action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 cause an additional hit.

strategies.name: Tough Ones
strategies.flavor: These Orcs are some of the toughest you've ever seen.
strategies.description: Use before taking Save rolls for an _Infantry_ unit. It gets +1 Save.

relics.name: Bloody Trophy
relics.description: Upgrade one Orc Warboss model with Frenzy Banner.
relics.flavor: A crimson banner, dyed in the blood of the Warboss's greatest kills, inciting an endless rage in their followers.
